params.name: strategy
params.label: Strategy
params.description: How existing votes in each statement column are used to generate missing votes in that column.

params.name: n_neighbors
params.label: Neighbors
params.description: Number of nearest neighbor participants from which to average each missing vote.

params.name: weights
params.label: Weighting
params.description: Whether calculated average of neighbors is distance-weighted or uniform.

params.name: n_components
params.label: Dimensions
params.description: Number of dimensions to reduce to. (3D plots not yet supported)

params.name: n_components
params.label: Dimensions
params.description: Number of dimensions to reduce to. (3D plots not yet supported)

params.name: n_neighbors
params.label: Neighbors
params.description: Number of nearest neighbors considered.

params.name: MN_ratio
params.label: MN Ratio
params.description: Ratio for mid-near pairs.

params.name: FP_ratio
params.label: FP Ratio
params.description: Ratio for further pairs.

params.name: n_components
params.label: Dimensions
params.description: Number of dimensions to reduce to. 3D plots not yet supported.

params.name: n_neighbors
params.label: Neighbors
params.description: Number of nearest neighbors considered.

params.name: MN_ratio
params.label: MN Ratio
params.description: Ratio for mid-near pairs.

params.name: FP_ratio
params.label: FP Ratio
params.description: Ratio for further pairs.

params.name: low_dist_thres
params.label: Low-Distance Threshold
params.description:
A distance threshold in the low-dimensional space,from within which
far pairs will be resampled in phase 3/3 of the algorithm.

params.name: n_components
params.label: Dimensions
params.description: Number of dimensions to reduce to. 3D plots not yet supported.

params.name: n_neighbors
params.label: Neighbors
params.description:
The size of the local neighborhood considered when search for the hidden shape.
Lower numbers prioritize local structure, higher numbers global structure.

params.name: min_dist
params.label: Min Distance
params.description:
How tightly UMAP is allowed to pack points together.
Smaller values show finer structure, larger ones show broader structure.

params.name: k_bounds
params.label: Cluster Min/Max
params.description: Lower and upper bound for number of clusters to test.

params.name: k_bounds
params.label: Cluster Min/Max
params.description: Lower and upper bound for number of clusters to test.

params.name: min_cluster_size
params.label: Min Cluster Size
params.description: Minimum size of clusters.

params.name: cluster_selection_method
params.label: Selection Method
params.description: How clusters are selected.
